nchack.NCData.rolling_max¶

NCData.rolling_max(self, window, cores=1)¶

Calculate a rolling maximum based on a window.

Parameters

  • = int (window) -- The size of the window for the calculation of the rolling maximum

  • cores (int) -- Number of cores to use if files are processed in parallel. Defaults to non-parallel operation

Returns

Reduced tracker with the rolling maximum

Return type

nchack.NCData
